entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
